name: Geometrical Clock
description:
A simple arcade bullet hell game

How to play:

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move

Hold "Left Shift" to slow down

Hold "Z" To shoot

Gameplay

You have 3 lives and must get through all levels

You can get a higher score through pickups, and killing/hitting enemies.

Graze can be obtained by being close to bullets without getting hit. It will also upgrade your damage once you hit a certain a

You can only be hit by bullets of a different color to that which is shown around the player.

A series of 10-second timers will gradually accumulate, each will change the color of the player's aura.
